Bakersfield.Bakersfield Heart Hospital: Bakersfield Heart Hospital is a hospital in Bakersfield, California, United States, specializing in the diagnosis and treatment of heart and vascular disease as well as a wide range of other medical and surgical procedures. The hospital also offers a full service emergency room, total joint program and accredited stroke center. With over 300 employees, the highly trained clinical and medical staff focus on patient-centered care.
